briefTitle: Comparison of Sevoflurane and Isoflurane Anesthesia for Benign Breast Tumor Excision
officialTitle: Anesthesia With Sevoflurane and Isoflurane for Excision Surgeries in Benign Breast Tumors
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Time of induction, maintenance and resuscitation
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Chinese
* Diagnosed benign breast tumor patients
* 18-64 yrs

Exclusion Criteria:

* Allergic to any interventional drugs
* Organic dysfunction
* Long-lasting PACU staying
